alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 9:14PM CDT until May 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in northern Texas... Eastern Archer County in northern Texas... Southeastern Wichita County in northern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 913 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wichita Falls to 6 miles southeast of Windthorst to 5 miles east of Graham, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Henrietta, Archer City, Iowa Park, Holliday, Petrolia, Scotland, Dean, Windthorst, Bellevue, Jolly, Newport, Lake Arrowhead, Sheppard AFB, Bluegrove, Lakeside City, Pleasant Valley, Shannon, Joy, and Vashti. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
